  • Have money? Baby will farm.

Have money? Baby will farm.

Grown in a small town, i had always dream to farm. Cultivation. But looking at the current farmer suicide rate in india (specially in maharastra) , i dont think agricultural farming is a good move. I am still able to earn considerable amount of money in software industry.

Was chatting with "the papa" (will be introduce in greater depth in follow up post) on the prospects of farming. "The papa"  suggested  honey bee farming. Its cheap, profitable and require less space. May be one can do it in his/her balcony?

But i think one should try ostrich farming.

 

Why?

 

They are amusing!
